name: Evil Inside (itch)
description:
Evil Inside is a 3D shooter. Your main goal is killing zombies and soldiers. Find lootboxes with weapon and resources to defeat enemies. Game is in development. multiplayer will be soon.  There are only some maps on screenshots. There are more of them in the game!

Write in comments if you found bugs =)

WASD - movement; Ctrl - crouch; Space - jump; Tab - invntory; W + Shift - run; Right mouse - shoot; Left mouse - aiming; P - game menu; F - pick up;
